* Iron Raptor stopped in her tracks, blinking in shock at what she heard 
from Hot Rod over her com link.
MAXIMALS were attacking the Chivitone base?
Hmm...she needed more information on this.*

" Hot Rod..."

* she replied with a frown.*

" Give me EVERY detail on this attack you have."
